feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.7.2
entry.content:
• [Radarr] Patched to no longer chase unreleased movies and added an option for movies with no release date (which is rare).

  • [Docs] Updated documentation - https://plexguide.github.io/Huntarr.io/apps/radarr.html that links to the app and has a flow chart and etc on how it works.

Information: You can see in the picture below, Huntarr processed the older version of a movie, but not the newer one, which is what we want.

Got rid of the drop down based on dates. It processed based on release dates or you can uncheck and will try to go after anything (which results in CAMs and bad copies)

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.7.3
entry.content:
Code Violations & Documentation Overhaul

The main thing about this release, we fixed many of the (i) links in the app for our noob users for documentation, rewrote much of the documentation, and for our SUBPATH proxy users, 71 hardlinks were found so this should resolve many issues.

  • Fixed 71 absolute URL violations - Converted all /api/ fetch calls and window.location.href redirects to relative URLs (./api/, ./) for proper subpath deployment support

  • Updated 15 outdated documentation links - Replaced old domain references in settings_forms.js with correct plexguide.github.io/Huntarr.io URLs and fixed all frontend→docs anchor alignment

  • Added missing documentation anchors - Fixed broken info icon links by adding missing IDs (#monitored-only, #skip-future-episodes, etc.) to Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, Readarr, and Whisparr docs

  • Realistic documentation updates - Removed non-existent "Logs" and "History" feature docs, replaced with actual features (Swaparr, Search Automation), and completely rewrote FAQ with practical solutions for real-world Docker/setup issues

  • Improved homepage UX - Added prominent community help section, made messaging less promotional and more technical, updated footer with direct community links, and better guided user flow from help→info→setup

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.7.4
entry.content:
• Minor fixes to 7.7.3 and 7.7.2 releases (including docs)
  • Sponsors fixes without timeout issues anymore

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.7.5
entry.content:
• [Huntarr] Support custom tagging for PR - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/579 - Option for custom tag

Changed the tag with a 2 on the end and you can see in the picture after, the tag in sonarr is the same! So enjoy changing the custom tag to whatever you want! I recommend Admin9705-Loves-Me

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.8.0
entry.content:
• WARNING & Feature - Updating will require you to set your missing and upgrade numbers per instance; there are no more global settings. - PR Request (https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/590)
  • You can now hide the gitstars and donation tag on the home page.
  • The homepage will no longer flash you; it will slowly transition to what your suppose to see.
  • API counts on the front page count even better (there were instances the numbers could plus up from other actions)
